screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .present file in Present Express 3
screenshot.caption: PRESENT file open in Present Express 3

description: Present Express is an open-source slideshow app similar to Microsoft Powerpoint . It is available to download as an individual program or with other Express apps, including Font (a font organizer), Type (a text editor), and Quota Express (a device storage manager).

With Present Express, you can create slides and add various elements, including text, shapes, colors, and charts. As you design the slideshow, you can save it as a PRESENT file to preserve your progress.
